mapper.update: CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS `stock_score_info` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'id', `stock_num` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '股票编码', `stock_name` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '股票名称', `date` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '日期', `strategy_id` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '策略id', `strategy_name` varchar(1024) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '策略简称', `score` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '得分', `score_desc` text COMMENT '得分描述', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `un_num_date_strategy_id` (`stock_num`,`date`,`strategy_id`), KEY `idx_date` (`date`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
